import React,{Fragment} from 'react' class Product extends React.Component{ state = { product:{ product_Name:'Apple iPhone 15', price:66499, image:'https://rukminim2.flixcart.com/image/224/224/xif0q/mobile/k/l/l/-original-imagtc5fz9spysyk.jpeg?q=90', qty:1 } } incrHandler = ()=>{ this.setState({product:{...this.state.product,qty:this.state.product.qty +1}}) } decrHandler = ()=>{ this.setState({ }) } render(){ return
Name Image Price Qty Total
{this.state.product.product_Name} {this.state.product.price} {this.state.product.qty} {this.state.product.price * this.state.product.qty}
} } export default Product
